sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form v-model="valid">
      <v-container >
        
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="lastname"
              bg-color="light-blue"
              variant="solo"
              :counter="10"
              :rules="lastnameRules"
              label="Votre nom"
              hide-details
              required
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
  
         
  
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="email"
              variant="solo"
              :rules="emailRules"
              label="Votre email"
              hide-details
              required
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="12"
          >
            <v-textarea
              
            prepend-inner-icon="mdi-comment"
              v-model="lastname"
              variant="solo"
              row-height="30"
              rows="4"
              :counter="10"
              :rules="lastnameRules"
              label="Votre commenaire"
              hide-details
              required
            ></v-textarea>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-form>
  </template>
  <script>
    export default {
      data: () => ({
        valid: false,
        firstname: '',
        lastname: '',
        nameRules: [
          value => {
            if (value) return true
  
            return 'Name is required.'
          },
          value => {
            if (value?.length <= 10) return true
  
            return 'Name must be less than 10 characters.'
          },
        ],
        email: '',
        emailRules: [
          value => {
            if (value) return true
  
            return 'E-mail is requred.'
          },
          value => {
            if (/.+@.+\..+/.test(value)) return true
  
            return 'E-mail must be valid.'
          },
        ],
      }),
    }
  </script>
